entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as one of the twins who are usually in the thick of things and like to be in the noisy center of attention. He is working silently on a piece of parchment with his brother George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as one of the twins who are usually in the thick of things and like to be in the noisy center of attention. He is working silently on a piece of parchment with his brother Fred.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as watching Fred and George work on a piece of parchment. He wonders if they are entering the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is mentioned as someone who would be let in on a joke by Fred and George if it were an order form for Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.

entities.name: weasleys' wizard wheezes
entities.description: Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes is mentioned as a business that Fred and George are involved in. Harry thought they might be working on an order form for the business.

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as a location where Fred and George sat together writing something before.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is mentioned as an event that Harry wonders if Fred and George are entering.

relationships.description: Fred and George are working together on a piece of parchment, which is unusual for them. They usually like to be in the thick of things and like to be in the noisy center of attention.
